titleStmt.title: Compendium politicum, or, The distempers of government under these two heads, the nobilities desire of rule, the commons desire of liberty : with their proper remedies, in a brief essay on the long reign of King Henry III / by J.Y. of Grayes-Inne, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Yalden, John.
Cotton, Robert, Sir, 1571-1631. Short view of the long life and raigne of Henry the Third.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Based on Sir Robert Cotton's A short view of the long life and raigne of Henry the Third.
